item.title: Hello, World!
item.author: mjs2600@gmail.com (Michael Simpson)
item.description: In this blog I plan to share interesting things that I find. I’m also hoping to post some of my half finished ideas and experiements. I think more clearly when I write and I’d like to take advantage of that to work through the things bouncing around in my head.

item.title: About Me
item.author: mjs2600@gmail.com (Michael Simpson)
item.description: { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "Person", "jobTitle": "Chief Data Scientist", "name": "Michael Simpson", "alumniOf": "Georgia Institute of Technology", "gender": "male", "url": "http://mjs2600.github.io/", "sameAs" : [ "https://twitter.com/mjs2600", "https://mastodon.technology/web/accounts/78564"] } I live in Middlebury, Vermont with my wife, Mary Jane, and two small children. I am the chief data scientist at Snthesis and a graduate from Georgia Tech’s OMSCS program. I also love to hike and play the ukulele.
